jsmodules.name: Fancybox 2
jsmodules.description: fancyBox is a tool that offers a nice and elegant way to add zooming functionality for images, html content and multi-media on your webpages. It is built on the top of the popular JavaScript framework jQuery and is both easy to implement and a snap to customize.

jsmodules.name: Flexslider
jsmodules.description: An awesome, fully responsive jQuery slider toolkit.
